message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Don't let the inflation eat away our money!
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is my final offer.
Don't bluff, Bob. You're losing money too. Let's split it fairly.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Take it or leave it.
